name: Global Marine and Maritime Associates, Inc.
description: Global Marine and Maritime Associates, Inc. (GMMA) is a leading provider of innovative solutions in the marine and maritime sector, specializing in shipbuilding, offshore engineering, and marine logistics. Established in 2010, GMMA aims to enhance the efficiency and sustainability of marine operations worldwide. The company is dedicated to the development of advanced maritime technologies, including autonomous vessels, eco-friendly propulsion systems, and integrated navigation solutions. GMMA collaborates with various stakeholders, including governments, maritime organizations, and private enterprises, to promote best practices and enhance safety standards in the industry. The company's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its initiatives to reduce emissions and improve fuel efficiency in maritime operations. GMMA also offers consulting services to help clients navigate regulatory challenges and implement cutting-edge technologies. With a focus on innovation, safety, and environmental stewardship, GMMA is positioned as a key player in shaping the future of the global maritime industry.

seo.meta_title: Global Marine and Maritime Associates, Inc. | Innovative Marine Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore GMMA, a leader in marine and maritime solutions, specializing in shipbuilding, offshore engineering, and sustainable maritime technologies.

faq.question: What does GMMA specialize in?
faq.answer: GMMA specializes in shipbuilding, offshore engineering, and marine logistics.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of GMMA?
faq.answer: Maria Gonzalez is the CEO of Global Marine and Maritime Associates, Inc.

faq.question: Where is GMMA headquartered?
faq.answer: GMMA is headquartered in Miami, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What products does GMMA offer?
faq.answer: GMMA offers cargo ships, fishing vessels, research vessels, offshore structures, and marine robotics.
